result.eng: Healthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ga: Bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin

result.eng: A lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ga: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh

result.eng: They helped a great deal of people.

result.ponchtml: Ċuidiġ siad le lear mór daoineThey helped a great deal of people.

result.eng: Some of the people were left unhappy.

result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ cuid de na daoine míẛástaSome of the people were left unhappy.

result.eng: People who speak Irish, for example you and me.

result.eng: People who suffered under the communist regime.

result.eng: People who take my loyalty for granted.

result.eng: Drugs are taken mostly by young people.

result.eng: Stay away from those people.

result.eng: At the start of the seventies people started to return home.

result.eng: Among the people.
result.ga: I measc na ndaoine
result.orig: I measc na ndaoine
result.html: I measc na ndaoineAmong the people.

result.eng: I like meeting people.

result.html: Is breá liom labhairt le daoineI like talking to people.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom laḃairt le daoineI like talking to people.

result.eng: I don't care what people think.

result.eng: People can have dreams and achieve them.

result.eng: I like helping people.

result.html: Is maith liom cabhrú le daoineI like helping people.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom caḃrú le daoineI like helping people.

result.eng: We want healthy people to give blood.

result.eng: The people around me.
result.ga: Na daoine i mo thimpeall

result.eng: All these people.
result.ga: Na daoine seo go léir

result.ponchtml: Na daoine seo go léirAll these people.

result.eng: The people would not accept that.

result.eng: I don't like narrow-minded people.

result.eng: Not many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ga: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.orig: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint

result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ga: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga

result.eng: This one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile

result.eng: We liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.

result.eng: People started getting off the train.
result.ga: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.orig: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.html: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.

result.eng: People came in crowds.
result.ga: Tháinig daoine ina sluaite
result.orig: Tháinig daoine ina sluaite
result.html: Tháinig daoine ina sluaitePeople came in crowds.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig daoine ina sluaitePeople came in crowds.

result.eng: Most of the people are here.
result.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de na daoine anseo
result.orig: Tá an chuid is mó de na daoine anseo
result.html: Tá an chuid is mó de na daoine anseoMost of the people are here.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de na daoine anseoMost of the people are here.

result.eng: Certain people are of the opinion that...
result.ga: Tá daoine áirithe den bharúil go
result.orig: Tá daoine áirithe den bharúil go
result.html: Tá daoine áirithe den bharúil goCertain people are of the opinion that...
result.ponchtml: Tá daoine áiriṫe den ḃarúil goCertain people are of the opinion that...

result.eng: New people are always welcome.
result.ga: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.orig: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.html: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ḋaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.

result.eng: You are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ga: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.orig: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.html: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anochtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá siḃ ar na ċéad daoine a ṫáinig anoċtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.eng: I get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.

result.eng: I don't get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Ní réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: I didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.
result.ga: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós ann
result.orig: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós ann
result.html: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós annI didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċas aċ tá neart daoine as Cois Ḟarraige fós annI didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.

result.eng: The people were nice.
result.ga: Bhí na daoine go deas
result.orig: Bhí na daoine go deas
result.html: Bhí na daoine go deasThe people were nice.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na daoine go deasThe people were nice.

result.eng: There are good amenities there and the local people are nice.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deas
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deas
result.html: Tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deasThere are good amenities there and the local people are nice.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deasThere are good amenities there and the local people are nice.

result.eng: But it's nice to meet new people, too.
result.ga: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisin
result.orig: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisin
result.html: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisinBut it's nice to meet new people, too.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá sé go deas casaḋ ar ḋaoine nua freisinBut it's nice to meet new people, too.

result.eng: The only people at home now are myself and my brother Pádraig.
result.ga: Níl sa bhaile anois ach mé féin agus mo dheartháir Pádraig
result.orig: Níl sa bhaile anois ach mé féin agus mo dheartháir Pádraig
result.html: Níl sa bhaile anois ach mé féin agus mo dheartháir PádraigThe only people at home now are myself and my brother Pádraig.
result.ponchtml: Níl sa ḃaile anois aċ mé féin agus mo ḋearṫáir PádraigThe only people at home now are myself and my brother Pádraig.

result.eng: All the people of the town will be there.
result.ga: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.orig: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.html: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muintir an ḃaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.orig: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.html: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.eng: His talent is that he understands people.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.

result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.
result.ga: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.orig: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.html: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áiritheSome people never stop laughing at them.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad de ẛíor ina gceap magaiḋ ag daoine áiriṫeSome people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: It's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ga: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.orig: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.html: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladhIt's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an ṁaise do ḋaoine a ḃeiṫ ag súil le molaḋIt's bad of people to expect praise.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.html: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daoine ann ċuala mé ag béiceaḋ iad aċ ní raiḃ mé in ann taḋall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: There were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.orig: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.html: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.

result.eng: She was collecting information about various people.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.orig: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.html: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi ḋaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: An rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: There are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ga: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.orig: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.html: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a ċeapfaḋ go ḃfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.

result.eng: I remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.html: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.html: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ponchtml: D'earcaiġ sé 15 duine eile naċ raiḃ mórán taiṫí acu aċ i ḃforéigean agus ċuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.orig: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.html: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ponchtml: Is beag sásaṁ a ḃaintear as aṫċúrsáil a ḋéanaṁ ar áḃar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile ċeana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: Many ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ga: Is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbh

result.html: Is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbhMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí gnáṫḋuine a ḃfuil gunna ina ẛeilḃMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.html: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: Only poor people take the bus.
result.ga: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.orig: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.html: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an busOnly poor people take the bus.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫógann aċ daoine boċta an busOnly poor people take the bus.

result.eng: Black people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ga: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.orig: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.html: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ponchtml: Tá Gormaiġ i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: Black people did not have full rights.
result.ga: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine Gorma
result.orig: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine Gorma
result.html: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine GormaBlack people did not have full rights.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cearta iomlána ag daoine GormaBlack people did not have full rights.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.orig: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.html: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ponchtml: In 1856 rialaiġ Cúirt Uaċtaraċ na Stát Aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: Who did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ga: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.orig: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.html: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis uilig ar ċuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?

result.eng: It is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ga: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.orig: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.html: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuideaċta ar an doṁan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín

result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
